sekilasInfo:
Sebuah website yang dibuat sebagai tugas akhir mata kuliah 'Pengantar Teknologi Internet'.
Mata Kuliah Ini Bersifat Front-End Saja (Tanpa Back-End) A..Aye..Ayee~ (>_<")

Lampiran Link Yang Digunakan:
[-] https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLC3y8-rFHvwhBRAgFinJR8KHIrCdTkZcZ
[-] https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/7781
[-] https://medium.com/codingthesmartway-com-blog/using-bootstrap-with-angular-c83c3cee3f4a
[-] http://jasonwatmore.com/post/2018/10/29/angular-7-user-registration-and-login-example-tutorial

Riwayat CLI:
$ npm install -g @angular/cli
$ ng new PTI-TugasAkhir
$ cd PTI-TugasAkhir
$ npm install [package]
$ ng generate component [view]
$ ng generate service [service]
$ ng generate guard [guard]
$ ng serve --open
$ ng build --prod
$ cd dist/PTI-TugasAkhir

WebHosting .htaccess Configuration:
RewriteEngine On
        # If an existing asset or directory is requested go to it as it is
        RewriteCond %{DOCUMENT_ROOT}%{REQUEST_URI} -f [OR]
        RewriteCond %{DOCUMENT_ROOT}%{REQUEST_URI} -d
        RewriteRule ^ - [L]
# If the requested resource doesn't exist, use index.html
RewriteRule ^ /index.html
